website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive urinary supplement made solely with pure and all-natural ingredients, this fast-acting liquid is worth a try, if only to see if its bladder-fortifying effects save kitty and your wallet from a trip to the vet.
pros: Targets burning, straining, spraying, strong odor, and inappropriate urination
cons: We suggest placing this supplement in your cat’s food or water, because treating it directly with the dropper may be difficult

customer_reviews.title: My kitty is so much better now!
customer_reviews.text: Our little kitty had a uti and I thought I'd give this a shot before taking him to the vet and it worked great. He stopped crying like he was in so much pain. I had to try something for my poor baby. It saved us a vet bill. I cringe at the thought of one on a low income budget.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Do not trust.
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 days of use, my kitty became lethargic. Her kidneys failed and we lost her. We had her uti treated at the vet, and only started using this after her treatment from them was complete to help prevent a reoccurance.
customer_reviews.author: KhaosF

customer_reviews.title: Good product- cats are now wet food addicted
customer_reviews.text: My cats rarely had wet food before this product was needed. I have a sassy cat and didn't want to fight with her to administer this product, so I put the drops in wet food. After 3 "doses", I suddenly have 3 cats yelling at me multiple times a day bc they want wet food. I almost rated this 4 stars bc of that annoyance, but the product helped my girl who was in so much discomfort that she would sit in the litter box for minutes trying to pee. After just a couple of days, she stopped having to try and was acting happy again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Boldin

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by Ivan the cat!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that helps our neutered boy cat, Ivan, with UTI's. Poor guy gets pretty bad, Vet's expensive and still doesn't respond like he does with these drops. Started using just a couple drops straight into his mouth daily, and he hasn't had any problems since. Never thought scooping big healthy urine balls in clumping litter would make me happy! He now literally jumps onto the bathroom vanity to get his drops every morning! I guess Ivan highly recommends them too!
customer_reviews.author: GolfinGirl

customer_reviews.title: Preventative? sure. treatment? No.
customer_reviews.text: Has had no effect and ive used at max amount. Took cat to vet and confirmed her UTI. still, 6 weeks later with just this, no improvements. Got her on meds :/ i gave it a real good try. I think used as a preventative may be beneficial, but jot for actual treatment of a uti already existing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: **WARNING** 20% Alcohol Ingredient!!
customer_reviews.text: **WARNING** 20% Alcohol Ingredient. View the picture inactive ingredients. Its shows as 20% USP alc. why abbreviate this? The only abbreviated ingredient. They are telling us to put drops of 20% ethyl alcohol directly into our pet’s mouth. A cat drinking wine could have a medical emergency. No wonder some have posted that their animal Vomited. I’m not trying to cause liver damage and the like. I would definitely dilute in water and wait the 20mins. BUT, do ASK your Veterinarian about this alcohol ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: ARSN

customer_reviews.title: An absolute life saver! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3-year-old male cat recently had a urinary blockage, and underwent a catheter and a 3 day stay in the pet hospital to relieve it. After we got him home, he seemed fully recovered, except for the fact that he was still urinating outside of his litterbox. I was at my wit's end and willing to try anything (also wanting to avoid another spendy vet bill) when I found this product. I added it to his wet food and within 2 days he had stopped urinating outside the litterbox. It's now been a week and I've discontinued administering the product to him. He seems fully recovered. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Take you cat to the vet if you suspect at all that he or she has a UTI. Do not feed any dry food. Do not feed seafood flavored cat food. Use a dripping faucet or a water dispenser that has running water. Get your cat to the vet. Did I say get your cat to the vet? I lost my cat because I thought these would work. They did not and I had time to treat him and I lost it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth L. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Best Low Cost Product on the Market !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Once again, the best brand for absolutely everything. Every single item I’ve purchased from this brand has been above and beyond my expectations and has saved me literally thousands of dollars in vet bills. Im horrible on money at the moment and my cat came down with what looked like a UTI. Frequent urination, “pink” bloody pee but eating and drinking fine. I bought this and after 3 days of use she’s doing soooo much better. She’s not at 100% yes but she shows progress everyday. Love love love this product! Also giving a few drops to my other cats every day because it is also a kidney support medication :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicky P

customer_reviews.title: Careful opening the bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This is just a word of caution about the plastic bottle itself: be careful when initially opening! I opened a brand new bottle today and when I turned it over to squeeze out 5 drops onto my cat's food, the whole dropper fell out, emptying nearly all the contents of the bottle into kitty's food, which I had to then throw away😡 I've used this, and other products by this brand quite frequently, and am happy with the results, but annoyed with what happened today.
customer_reviews.author: Back2Future

customer_reviews.title: If anything, this made things worse.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older, fixed, female cat who frequently gets UTIs. As you all know the vet will charge over $100 just to walk through the door so I thought I’d try something natural first when she started going outside the box. I used this as directed for 3 days and it actually seems to have made her symptoms worse.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work almost killed my cat
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this for your cat and expect it to work if you buy this medication for your cat it will not work and leaving your cat unattended with a urinary tract infection will kill them this junk almost killed my cat I had to go back with my original medication which is nutri-vet salmon paste and cosequin pills which works fantastic I thought this would be a good choice since it is all natural but it is not a good choice absolutely do not buy this crap this trash absolutely does not work it almost killed my cat if I could leave less than 1 star I would
customer_reviews.author: Ironeagle

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant to try this product considering I am no veterinarian and I wasn’t totally sure how safe the product was. However, after doing a little digging I decided to give it a go. Used for my cat. After 2-3 days of following the dosage instructions my cat stopped urinating outside of the litter box. She had absolutely no side effects from taking this. Would highly recommend trying this, but I think it’s important to note that after continuous use with no results it is ALWAYS a good idea to contact your vet, as there may be a more serious issue causing the misbehavior.
customer_reviews.author: josslyn

customer_reviews.title: Take your cat to the vet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bc my cat was urinating blood and his antibiotics weren't working. Finally took him to my old vet and he was diagnosed with bladder stones (x-ray). Wish I hadn't wasted my money on this, the cat hated it and I forced it down his throat for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: BleuCatQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I started seeing blood in my cat's urine, he had very low energy levels and he was going outside of his litter box, After doing some research I decided to try this product before going to the vet. I add about 15 drops to his food morning and evening (currently on day 4) and his symptoms have already cleared up. No more blood in urine and no going outside of the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Klaudia S

customer_reviews.title: it seemed to work
customer_reviews.text: My poor cat was displayed some obvious UTI symptoms and with all the shut downs I didn't want to take him in... i tried this in an effort to do something and he has decreased his trips to the litter box, stopped urinating outside the litterbox and seems to spend less time cleaning down there...i think it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I was very sceptical about giving this to my cat without the vet's permission, but after over a thousand dollars in vet bills with no results and a little faith in all the good reviews, I started giving this drop to my cat, starting with one drop a day in case it wouldn't agree with him. He's cured and I still cannot believe it !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps A Lot
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This has worked so well for my cat. I took her to the vet and they recommended a expensive prescription food which I couldn't afford. I tried this along with a urinary tract food and had a great outcome. I feel like this has really helped my cat with her struvite stones and she has been using her litter box...finally! It's not a sure fix but it definitely helps and for the price...it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Aniala

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use..
customer_reviews.text: Been using diluted on a dropper for cat prone to problems. Also started calming collar...she gets stressed induced cystitis. So.. she seems to be better. I will continue w 5 drops a day for maintenance Why not. She doesn't mind the dropper too much but doesn't want it twice in. As I don't get it all in . Then I just add remainder to drinking water. Ourother cats use this water too (we have 4 cats and several water stations) and none of them avoid it so it must not taste too bad.
customer_reviews.author: sdrockgirl8999999999999

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats that have never had issues with peeing outside the litter box. Very suddenly, one of them (or both, I’m not sure) started peeing in my bed, numerous times. After troubleshooting lots of options, I started putting this in their water dishes daily, and within days the problem was solved. I bought more of this to put in their water a couple times a week, just as a way to promote their urinary tract health. Me and my poor mattress have been saved, and I will continue to use this product!
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it helped and may have saved my fur baby cat and wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I have a fur baby cat that has cost me $1300 to unblock his urinary tract at the local vet last year. Despite he is on a total wet and dry food diet of high quality low Ph diet for cats with urinary tract issues, he was peeing less and less. What little he did pee had a strong odor. I followed the directions this product and he is now back to normal and not crouching in the litter box for long periods of time trying to pee. Had him back in shape after two days. I am lucky I caught it early and found this diet supplement to help.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF
customer_reviews.text: My female cat hind legs were born deformed but she scoirs around like the wind on her littke flippy type feet. All organs function well except she has smaller kidneys...thus keep her on ph balanced water with bioking homeo products. When gets in bladder/kidney distress..I use these hemo products along with urinary support food and it restores her to comfort..eyes are bright shes up and running about..pooping and peeing. All is right with her world. Havent had to make a dash to the vet..only when in crisis. Using the bioking and UTI products..keeps all working okeedokee. Makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shara Scott

customer_reviews.title: Hit & miss with this. Works for 1 cat, may not for another....Worth keeping on hand, though...
customer_reviews.text: I use natural and Homepathic meds before going the traditional paths. This is one item I rely on when one of my cats begins displaying symptoms of UTI. Sometimes it works, and sometimes it doesn't. May work on one cat, but doesn't work on another. Usually, it does catch the UTI in time for which we're both glad, the cat and myself. Even our vet agrees with keeping it on hand to keep UTI's at bay. It is worth keeping on hand, if you have cats. For female cats, though. Male cats may actually have a blockage and for that, please go to your vet because that can be life threatening. Whenever in doubt, please consult your veterinarian.
customer_reviews.author: University DocTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This product helped my 12 year old start peeing again. After doing research about her condition of not urinating fully and blood in her urine, I decided to try this. My cat will not eat if anything wierd is in her food, but had to try. I put a dropper full on each time I fed her, which is 1/3 cup 3X a day. She ate it without hesitation, so I am assuming it tasted okay. Within two days, she stopped bleeding and now can go without problems. I still give it to her for maintenance once a day. She's back to her old grumpy self. So happy 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after taking my cat to the vet for suspicion of a blockage/UTI. They gave him some fluids, pain meds and an anti-inflammatory! I just wanted to have this on hand just in case and it was affordable so we gave it a shot. We took the antibiotics the vets gave for 5 days and saw a little improvement. We started with the most intense dose on the package after his meds were done and then slowly faded the doses and within days, we was using the bathroom again!! It was amazing and I will never not keep this on hand again. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Moore

customer_reviews.title: This product is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I have a 12 year old Ragdoll who has recurring UTI . A vet bill of at least $200 of every occurrence. I ordered this product after much research. It came and I still rather doubted it. I tasted it, it has no taste and is clear as water. So I proceeded to dose her , she didn’t mind it at all. She was better in just one afternoon and by night time she was purring in my lap. I couldn’t believe it. Even with meds from the vet the uti lasted almost a week. She was miserable and I was miserable. No more thank you HomeoPet UTI.
customer_reviews.author: helen musgrove

customer_reviews.title: Quite literally saved my cats life. I'm a forever customer now.
customer_reviews.text: I have a one year old male Bombay cat. Recently, we noticed some odd behaviors. He was squatting to urinate around the house which is highly unlike him, and then we realized he was straining when the stressed out meowing came. We don't have the funding for a lot of veterinary care, and I'm so grateful to have found this product at an incredibly affordable price. We dosed him for the acute case, which I believe is 6 rounds of 5 drops within 15 minute intervals. We also dropped a few into his water bowl for good measure. The next morning, and he is peeing normally again! I can't recommend a product more. Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My sweet boy occasionally has UTI symptoms. Every time this has cleared him up in just a few days! He's a smart cookie, so adding anything to his food or water doesn't work (also it does have a horrible smell so that's probably part of it). I give it to him directly in his mouth, followed by a few treats of apology. Highly impressed and will continue to use ~ saves on hundreds of dollars of vet bills.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy in N.C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing how well this works!
customer_reviews.text: So, our third cat suffers from crystals in his urine. From what I have read it would take a surgery to basically cut off his penis to fix. Sooooo, I add mannose d powder to his wet food and he's been ok but crying a lot lately so I started to use these again. I swear, within a day he stopped crying. I had to order a new bottle (this one) and I went a day without giving him any and he was crying again. As soon as I gave it to him he was quiet. Whatever it does, it works! If rather keep giving him this than antibiotics all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy cav

customer_reviews.title: They work for cats with urinary issues!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has a history of UTIs and urinary blockage. Vet bills have been in the thousands. We use these drops during times of stress to prevent him from having problems. Used when we moved cross country and he was in the car for several days... he HATES the car. Our sitter also gives it to him while we're out of town. We put a few drops in his soft food. He LOVES the flavor and thinks it's a treat. So far he has not had a single UTI or blockage since we've been using this (Knock on wood). UTI Plus is super affordable and works, in our experience. He's also on Rx food for his issues.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: Easy cat uti remedy
customer_reviews.text: easy remedy for cat uti My cat was acting strange and seemed to be in pain cleaning him self and crouching as if he needed go to cat litter in weird places that where nor his litter box All symptoms of cat uti . So I tried these Odorless colorless drops Did not taste /added to my cats water And he drank it up right away I do believe it has a calming effect on my pet Because he decided to take a nap shortly after . Highly recommend any cat parent in between vet visit if your cat is showing any uti symptoms to use right away .
customer_reviews.author: Alittlebyrd

customer_reviews.title: This has saved me a fortune
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this stuff has saved me so much! I've had dozens of cats in my life but for some reason my Siamese mixes always seem to get UTI's! I've spent a fortune on vet bills for overnight IV infusions of antibiotics. When I noticed my not so little guy straining to go and saw blood in the toilet, I decided to give this a try before taking him to the vet and thank goodness it worked! Within days he was going in long relief filled streams! Now I give him a couple drops a day as well as changing his diet of wet and dry food to UTI formula's.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquieblue

customer_reviews.title: The dropper dispenser was loose !
customer_reviews.text: My cat has inflammation in his bladder so I wanted to try this homeopathic medicine for him . I opened the cap plastic and got ready to give my cat medicine directly from the bottle nozzle .. the next moment the nozzle being loose went inside my cat’s mouth and medicine all over him !!! I was so scared that my cat swallowed the plastic nozzle! I think the bottle nozzle dropper had a defect .. The medicine was wasted and nozzle is defective. I don’t know about the actual product because I didn’t get to see results:(( Please be careful!!
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My three y/o neutered male cat started urinating behind the litter box about once a month. $$$ spent at the vet. Can't really find anything wrong. Three months on UTI + and not one accident. Cat has had kidney issues since about 12 weeks. Had sub-q fluids for months. No infections. BUN a little high, but on raw diet. Had tried just about everything; medications, CBD, other homeopathic remedies, tweaking diet. He's also happier as he obviously feels better.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L

customer_reviews.title: no more smell
customer_reviews.text: My 17 yr old cat started smelling like she had a UTI, in the past I would give her products with cranberry and they would work, well nothing was working and she had me worried because cats can die from a UTI. Well I started reading about this product because I had bought other products by the same company and everything had always worked. So I got this and the next day she felt better. I have used it everyday once a day now and she is herself again. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caution when using this medication
customer_reviews.text: My female cat started having some bladder issues. This medication worked great for her. Them my male cat started having issues. This medication DID NOT work for him. I ended up taking him to the vet because he wasnt able to urinate at all! My male cat almost died. I throw this medication out and switched their dry food to another brand. I haven't had a problem with their bladders since.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth T.

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with this. I hoped, but didn’t think this would work. Noticed my cat was not himself on Monday; crying, growling, and urinating outside the liter box. Knew what the symptoms were and looked up home remedies before taking to the vet. Noticed symptoms on Monday, started medicine Tuesday along with urinary tract specific food and by Wednesday he seemed like he was already feeling a little better. Today, Thursday, almost all back to his usual playful, friendly, cuddly self, and back to peeing in liter box. Yayyy! Thank you for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my cat
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an alternative until I got to the vet. My cat starting urinating all over and from what I found it probably meant UTI as nothing else has changed. So I used this for the week leading up to the vet appointment and he stopped peeing everywhere and started using his box again. When we got to the vet they said his urine was good and it "may have fixed him, but without knowing if there was a UTI, cant say for sure" I didn't figure they would support something that didn't make them money. BUT I AM PLEASED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon has no business in politics

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this on my 11 year old cat who started to cry a little bit and strain occasionally as she tried to empty her bladder. I've been using this for two weeks and so far she seems much more comfortable and no more crying or straining. I will write another review in a few weeks and let you know the final outcome. So far, I recommend this product. By the way, she does not even notice it when I put the drops on either her wet food or dry food so I believe there is no odor or taste.
customer_reviews.author: Rainier

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magic. My kitty has been throwing up for a long time and I just assumed it was hairballs, then I noticed she was dribbling on the floors. I googled feline UTI and found out that it can cause kitties to throw up. In my googling I came across this product and decided to give it a try. This has been a lifesaver. I was cleaning up messes twice a day. She hasn't thrown up since I received this in the mail. It has been one whole week now with no throwing up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: My cat started showing signs of kidney failure and these drops, along with colloidal silver, cured his incontinence, painful meowing during urination, and made his feces twice the size. It soothed kitty within a day and cured him after 2 weeks. Kitty's healthy again and happy. Shouldn't be used for more than 2 weeks. Alfalfa and some of the other ingredients can have adverse effects if used longer.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: I NEVER buy homeopathic but glad I did!!
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER buy homeopathic things! Mainly because I'm a skeptic and also because they usually have a list of a hundred herbs/plants that I can't possibly look up to make sure they are safe...well I'm glad I tried this! After 3 rounds of antibiotics and urinary treats that my cat hated - this is working!! I did the emergency protocol the first few days ..now I'm doing 10 drops twice a day and he's MUCH better! 90% I also switched to iams urinary food as well!! Could be both things? But I'm 99% sure it was this! I don't water it down 10 drops directly in his mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Worked!
customer_reviews.text: Kitten was peeing a lot, in boxes, and on carpet, too. Swollen vaginal area and constantly licking the area. Tried this until i could get her to a vet. It cleared it up, following the directions after just a few days. She had been getting worse each day before she took it. Then, she gradually got better with it. Didn’t have to take her to a vet thanks to the medication. She didn’t like taking it, as she is picky in regards to taste of things. It was easy to administer to her.
customer_reviews.author: JackChiu

customer_reviews.title: Works Pretty Well
customer_reviews.text: I noticed one of my cats exhibiting signs of a urinary tract infection so I purchased this right away. I have 3 cats so all 3 got treated; I put it in their water and on their soft food. The infected cat seemed to get better within a few days. The only downside is it seems to only treat and not prevent because he looks like he's uncomfortable again. I will treat them all again over the next few days. I would still recommend this for quickly and cheaply treating a cat with a UTI.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: We started having an issue with our 2yr old wanting to urinate on any kind of fabric or carpet that was on the floor. Someone recommended a different brand that had some reviews which worried us. We purchased this one instead and I mixed it with their food at first but she could tell. I then just added a small amount to her water bowl and after a couple of days everything is back to normal and she's using the litter box once again!
customer_reviews.author: TWDesigns

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS!! My cat was peeing everywhere. After some research I found out stress UTIs is common in cats and my boy is a little scardy cat. I noticed he would go to the litter box and start meowing or go into the litter box meow and get out without peeing. I knew for a fact it was a UTI when I vhanged the litter and he didnt instantly go pee in it to mark it like he does. He when in meowed and got out like before. They always have a clean litter box too.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Jariwala

customer_reviews.title: Think this caused our cat to spray...
customer_reviews.text: This product may work... Our cat had crystals and got a blockage so we took him to the vet. When he came home he seemed happy a few days and we thought we would try these drops to help sooth his sore bladder (it had been really distended from the blockage) and hopefully promote faster recovery. He started spraying EVERYWHERE and he never did that even with the crystals. We stopped the drops and he hasn't sprayed since. So I think something in the drops caused it. They may help someone's cat but they just didn't seem to have the desired outcome for our kitty. (Every kitty is different though!)
customer_reviews.author: TRIPLE_M

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: My cat developed a uti and I was worried. Started seeing him pee outside the litter box but little came out. I looked online for possible problems and a uti popped up. I did not want to spend to much for it so looked for other ways and this came up. I doubted it would work due to the price but it worked. I was shocked something like this would fix a medical issue. I just placed a few drops on all his food. He was back good in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Zo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Natural Remedy
customer_reviews.text: I can't attest to flavor (I did taste it, not tasty), but this will stop my straining cat within an hour. She rests, sleeps, feels better and spotting stops. She has spotting due to stress, and occasional UTIs. Something in this helps her relax and not stress. I always keep this on hand. Most of the homeopet products are top notch and worth having for any of the little things that come up.
customer_reviews.author: HCNYC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I have been feeding several stray cats and we have been catching and getting them all medical treatment and spade or neutered. The most recent cat we took in Banshee his urine was so strong. and he was peeing all the time. I started giving him Homeo Pet in his water and dose per the instructions on the box. After a week, he no longer was going to the bathroom several times an hour and having accidents on the furniture. I also noticed a slight decrease in odor. Banshee was completely better after three weeks. It worked wonders for him.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: My poor kitty had a urinary infection
customer_reviews.text: She was peeing all over the house. I googled it, and learned that cats do that when they have urinary infection pain, they blame the litter box for the pain and stop using it. I had to confine her. I didn't want the vet bill if I could avoid it so I looked on amazon for treatment. In addition to giving her the medicine, I also thoroughly cleaned her litter box. Within a week after I started treatment, my kitty was using her box again. That makes us both happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really does work
customer_reviews.text: I never usually do reviews but I know reading some of the other reviews prior to buying this helped me make my choice. My cat was on her second time around of getting a Uti she had the foul smelling urine and urgency to urinate. Decided to try this homeopathic uti before taking her to the vet again and stressing her out. I noticed a difference 24 hours after giving it to her, first day gave her 5 drops 3 times a day no more foul smelling urine and urgency to pee went away. It truly does work.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M Long

customer_reviews.title: Helped but then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year-old cat Chester had recurrent UTIs. At first, this product helped him when he started to show signs of blockage but then it stopped working altogether. I cannot stress this enough. If your cat starts to show signs of discomfort, has difficulty peeing, licks his private area excessively, take to the vet immediately. This is definitely not a miracle product. I appreciate that it did extend his life but sadly his blockage became severe. We took him to the vet's office and they did nothing to save him. He died peacefully at home.
customer_reviews.author: febangel

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: I’m always too busy to write reviews. But my baby got better and this deserves my review. My cat was having all the symptoms described and he healed in like 3 days. I had already been mixing apple cider vinegar to his food and water because the product took a few days to arrive but I do believe this helped him get better. Apple cider vinegar is also the real deal when it comes to cat UTI, I recommend reading into it if you are having this issue. I have to say, having my cat pee all over the house including my bed was a nightmare. He is better and healed I’m so happy. Happy cat means happy Mom❤️
customer_reviews.author: alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle. My boy was getting utis quite frequently and I would use these in between vet appointments to relieve some of the pain. They work fantastic and he always seemed very happy when he saw me put it in his food.
customer_reviews.author: hayhaychan

customer_reviews.title: These drops really work fast and easy to deliver
customer_reviews.text: This really helped cure my cat’s urinary track problems. I had to use the maximum amount of 15 drops for about a week and then down to maintenance of 5 drops for a time. It really works and my cat is doing so much better. I just put the drops on her cat treats and she eats them as if nothing were on them. Easy to give and a real help.
customer_reviews.author: Alean Barfuss

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is so amazing. I went to the emergency vet and spent ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so amazing. I went to the emergency vet and spent well over $550 on x-rays to see if my cat had stones etc and on meds. The antibiotics helped, but not until after about a week. I ordered this product and gave it to her 3-4 times daily with a spoonful of wet food and she seemed better just after a day. She was peeing and no longer straining. I normally would think this homeopathic way of treating animals is who-do lol but this stuff works!! Save your money unless you feel there is something seriously wrong with your cat
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Victoria Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Saved my cats life
customer_reviews.text: This saved me a ton at the vet and my cats life. After her peeing outside her box, everywhere, and us thinking it was a territory thing because she could smell the neighbors cat that was outside, I saw blood in her urine after she peed on her toy. This was recommended, along with switching to a fountain instead of a bowl, and wet food twice a day. Needless to say, she pees normal amounts now in her box only and she's back to being loveable as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Knight

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my cat within just 2-3 days she was better. Skipped the costly vet trip and researched her issues on my own online, came up with this and wet cat food as a solution to her symptoms of UTI/bladder trouble which were: Peeing in places other than litter box..like she was trying to tell me something. Difficulty pooping, painful Not drinking water or drinking way too much water Not herself, just seemed down and would not play. A stray male was terrorizing her and she stopped going out, then got sick.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Excellent natural uti treatment!
customer_reviews.text: My cat had been urinating outside of the box and had small amount blood in her urine. She had stopped eating and started losing weight fast. Researched how to help, naturally, and found this product. It’s priced low which is a plus! So, I purchased it, and paired it with kitten food to help her gain weight. She loved it. Didn’t detect the drops at all. Within a few days, she was feeling better. No longer goes outside of the litter box and no more blood. It’s been less than a month and She’s already gained a lot of weight back too! Highly recommend this product! It works!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's working!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old male tabby cat, he was straining and having trouble peeing. I gave hime 4 doses the first day, a few hours apart from each other. It started working during the night. First there were drops of blood but then he started going quite frequently. He still isn't feeling well, but I can tell it is definitely working...
customer_reviews.author: Aymi

customer_reviews.title: On 2nd bottle
customer_reviews.text: This has been a miracle for my elderly cat that was squatting in pain. I used up the first bottle rather quickly then her symptoms came back so i rushed another order. This time I am administering directly into the mouth rather than in a little bit of wet food. She hates the taste but tolerates it. I am grateful to have found something to ease her pain. Just unsure this will actually cure a UTI . Maybe I will update the review if the symptoms come back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my cat! On maintenance dose now
customer_reviews.text: My cat had recurrent UTIs, this stuff worked during the acute phase. I now give a few drops in her wet food every time. What helped a lot was mixing her food with water 1:1 (she eats nutro grain free wet food), she pees a ton now and hasn’t had a uti in over 9 mos
customer_reviews.author: Marysara

customer_reviews.title: WORKS! gave my senior cat fast relief
customer_reviews.text: My old man cat has had bladder stone/uti issues his whole life and when a recent flare up happened I ordered this asap and within a few days he was back to normal. I was using other home remedies to help him such as apple cider vinegar, but this medicine gave him noticable relief from the frequency/pain/accidents within 24 hours. It was easy to give it to him with kibble as long as bone broth was added to the kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Whysexual

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work!
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats was having some issues peeing around the house, so I bought this product to try out. It took a week or so, but the problem was resolved! Thank goodness! It was easy to squirt into the water dish or onto food/treats. He didn't seem to notice a difference and he ate and drank like normal.
customer_reviews.author: kmthoennes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for my cat.
customer_reviews.text: Used for male cat with uri symptoms. I couldn’t dose him directly because he’s too fast and I’m to slow! So I added these drops to his water and he appeared to not notice it. within 3 days of being able to only dose him twice a day, he began showing signs of improvement. Within a week he was back to normal and I continued dosing for a total of 10 days for good measure.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Thought my cat had a UTI because he peed everywhere. We started using this. And voila! He stopped. It was like magic. I was skeptical but it worked and I am so thankful and glad my kitty is feeling better.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Michael thanks you.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old male cat has been having issues, when it comes to how much he pees and where he pees. Yes, he is fixed. I noticed he was drinking more water than usual and his pee had a pungent smell, which was horrible because I have a litter box in my home. I started giving him this product on March 12th and I see a huge difference. The strong urine smell has gone away and I don’t see him drinking water like he was before. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cattastic!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats are litter mates- both 15+ years old. They hate car rides and going to the Vet. By the time we arrive (5 blocks away) they are so upset, the Vet is afraid they are going to ‘stroke out’. We finally tried HomeoPet Feline Urinary Tract med. After about 2 months we went back to Vet for another issue - infected salivary gland! They could not believe how well ‘Big’ was doing. Gained weight, all lab work had improved. The Vet was so impressed with outcome. I continue to use for both cats on a weekly basis to keep things in check!
customer_reviews.author: Babs de pastel

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about how amazing this product is! My cat had a UTI and we took her to the vet. She was given antibiotics for a week and it didn’t get any better! She was howling in pain and bleeding everywhere! She got a second round of antibiotics yet it still did not get better! We tried Homeopet UTI and it cleared up within 2 days!!!!! This poor cat was suffering for so long until we bought this product! I would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Angelosmom

customer_reviews.title: My Finicky Cat (like most) HATES the taste and smell!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how effective this product is. My cat HATES the taste and/or smell of it. Yes, I followed the tips and let the alcohol preservative "burn off". It didn't matter, she wouldn't drink it in her water, she wouldn't swallow it in a pill pocket or her food. Trying to administer via the bottle or a syringe is frustrating and virtually impossible. So that's that.
customer_reviews.author: TechyChris

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief for my cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat has frequent UTIs. The vet says they are "stress" induced - no crystals- and gives no meds. Only recommends wet cat food. I can't stand to see my cat in pain, constantly going to the litter box and cannot pee but a drop. I followed the instructions and gave her drops and she gets relief within 30 -60 minutes and completely better in 24 hours. It's a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Worked and worked quickly
customer_reviews.text: My male cat who used to be a stray is very cautious. We were working in 'his' bathroom. He was too afraid to go in and use his box. I assume the infection came from holding it. For the price I thought why not give this a try. It started to relieve his frequent urination within the first day or so. I was so happy for him and it saved me money not having to take him to the vet. I definitely would have taken him had I not seen a vast improvement right away. I highly recommend this product! The only down side is giving a dose several times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Pipps

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I tried buying in my local pet store the didn't have it. I got here for great price and it helped our cat he had blood in his urine after using the recommended dosage after a couple of weeks a boy was no longer having blood in his urine work fantastic if I must say so my opinion
customer_reviews.author: staten island n.y

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this based off the reviews, but I am on the second bottle of this stuff and have seen no improvement in my cat at all (she has itchy/burning urination and scooting). I'm all for herbal remedies, but this just doesn't seem to be helping her. (I used as directed)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Working pretty good so far!
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats (of 6) that urinate around the house, and it is likely from stress of outdoor ferals in the yard. Started with this remedy, and the spraying has slowed down quite a bit! Not perfect, but much better than before. I put in their food 2 to 3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. My cat was peeing on things, and I used to see if it could help her. Shortly after giving her this and she started bleeding from her “area” and I had to take her into the vet. Ended up walking out with a $400 vet bill. Just take your kitty to the vet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Gaylor

customer_reviews.title: It is working on my cats, very happy
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats had chronic UTIs. So far we have used this on all the cats for several months and we have not had a UTI among the bunch since day one of starting these drops. We dose their wet food twice a day. I now recommend this product line to every cat owner.
customer_reviews.author: Po' Mrs Barlow ;)

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a special needs kitty so she will not take anything mixed her water or food. No matter how I tried to disguise it she always knew it was there. I resorted to giving it to her by drops directly into her mouth. She disliked the taste very much. I treated her for 2 weeks as directed and no change in her urine. It may work for some cats but not for my special kitty
customer_reviews.author: Andra Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this after my cat starting peeing next to the litterbox even when it was just cleaned. I figured she may have a UTI. Instead of going to the vet and returning with $80+ bill, I decided to give this a try. I mixed it in with her hairball gel and she licked it up with no problem. One week later, she's back to using her litterbox!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is working. My cat does great for a week or so, and then has issues urinating in the bathtub or on a rug off and on. I’ve been using this just about daily for the past 2-3 months.
customer_reviews.author: CHamrin

customer_reviews.title: My male cat was diagnosed with crystals and after reading ...
customer_reviews.text: My male cat was diagnosed with crystals and after reading the reviews I could not wait to try this product. After a few weeks of using this product I still did not notice any difference in his behavior or bathroom habits. There definitely did not seem to be any negative effects, but I can't say for sure if these drops helped my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy NYC

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our 4 year old female cat who gets recurring UTIs and it worked within a few days/doses. You might go to a vet for the first suspected uti and then do treatments at home. She will pee on things when she has an infection, so we know she needs some meds. Vet told us it was common and she has no other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked quickly and effectively
customer_reviews.text: The second I saw my cat sitting weird I knew he was struggling with the beginnings of a UTI. I had this delivered same day and gave him a dose in the morning and night. His symptoms were completely gone after 2 to 3 days and is back to his happy self. I kept giving him a dose once a day for a couple days after just to make sure symptoms didn't come back. Definitely will use this again if we need to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I add 5-7 drops to my cats wet food. She eats it without hesitation, so I assume she can't taste it. But within a few days, there was no sign of infection. Now I give it every few days as a preventative measure. Will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fast acting!
customer_reviews.text: There are a couple different brands of this type of stuff, all with mostly the same ingredients, and in my experience they all seem to work pretty well on minor to moderate UTIs. This stuff however is considerably cheaper than most brands and for some reason my cats don't seem to mind when I put in in their mouth so 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Scott N. Clark

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: In three days my cat's symptoms cleared up. I was a little skeptical when I bought this, but let me tell you... It works like a charm and my cat couldn't taste it on her treat that I gave her to take it. She was back to her normal self in three days.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn T.

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: My cat showed signs of a UTI, he has never had one before, I put this in my cats food and water and with in a few days he stopped peeing on things around the house. This was the first time my cat started showing signs of a UTI. I also had litter that indicated there was a UTI issue so I know my cat was not just being stubborn. I would defiantly recommend this product, it saved me an expensive vet bill.
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: My kitty feels better.
customer_reviews.text: Mousie was using the litter a lot and bleeding in the bath tub. I knew she wasn’t feeling good and she was in pain. We don’t have money for a vet so I looked for the best product review for help with urinary tract infections in cats. Found this. She was back to her old self in three days! I give it to her once every two weeks now. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My male cat has uti’s a lot and I bought this when he was starting to show signs. I was tired of spending hundreds on meds that didn’t work. Within a week of starting this (putting in his wet food) I noticed a huge difference. Now I’m buying it to keep on hand. We use wysong uretic dry food along with a grain free wet food for prevention, we get both from amazon and all is better than what we were getting from the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The top fell off the second is better.
customer_reviews.text: Update bought a new one and this is a little better than the last. Thank you I went to administer this to my cat and the dropper fell right off I lost most of the bottle. I'm extremely upset it ended up all over my cat and i can't afford to buy more right now. If i could give less stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gruner

customer_reviews.title: Best thing out there!
customer_reviews.text: Older cat with diabetes. He doesn't mind the taste, and hasn't had any UTI's since we started using. Plus, it's reasonably priced. I tries the $25 brand first & the taste was really bitter. You can't always count on how many stars an item has. This is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap way to help my cat maintain urinary health
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say for certain that this helps but I know that when I tried to wean my cat off (based on direction), they had trouble again. It’s a cheap and easy way to help my cat out. Also my cat is super finicky about adding medicine to his food, so I love that this has never been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: MelbaJ

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My male cat was completely blocked and unable to use the litter box and I didn't have the hundreds of dollars that it would have costed for surgery so I bought this medicine as a last resort and it actually worked!! My cat has been fine now for several weeks
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Davila

customer_reviews.title: My cat won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so badly for this to work on my 11-year old male cat. I added 5 drops to canned salmon. He loves salmon. He must have smelled or tasted it and didn't eat much. I even smelled and tasted it. It doesn't have a powerful flavor or odor. Must just be my picky cat.
customer_reviews.author: Webb

customer_reviews.title: HomeiPet UTI Plus has been very helpful in treating my female cat.
customer_reviews.text: HomeiPet UTI Plus has been very helpful in treating my female cat. Her symptoms are very high ph and urinating in window sills. She has no other symptoms of uti. Experienced with older male helped us learn about diet. Her diet is adjusted. Our vet reviewed the ingredients of this product and concluded that extensive use will not harm her. It appears to be helping. We are happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this on Chewy but saw it here for close to the same price and said Ok. This stuff has been a life savor for my cats when I can see they’re coming down with utis. It’s easy to drop into any food. They don’t seem to mind the taste.
customer_reviews.author: kittymagik

customer_reviews.title: Life savior👍😀 no more inappropriate peeing.
customer_reviews.text: Long story short, we just moved into a new home and have 3 cats and a dog. Perivious owners had a dog and a cat. Shortly after moving in 2 of my cats started peeing and spraying my walls😡GROSS. I was so mad, so I saw this product and was skeptical. Knock on wood this stuff works. After 2 days of usage, no more peeing in corners and on walls.😀 Its now been 2 weeks, and they are not misbehaving. I found it easier to just drop a few drops directly into there mouths, rather than into their water bowls. This way I know for sure they are getting it . Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline morris

customer_reviews.title: Great but not always the solution
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I used this on my female kitty and it worked amazingly then my male cat got FLUTD and this did absolutely nothing. Final verdict try it but if you don’t see your cat getting better after a day or two... GO TO THE VET. You and your kitty will thank me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: instant relief for my cat
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier. My elderly male cat was meowing while peeing and going in and out of the box. I decided to treat for a uti and if it didn’t clear up, vet. Turns out it was a UTI, because this stuff cleared him up right away. He’s now just peeing as normal without being vocal. He seems much more at ease! Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rose

product_meta.title: HomeoPet Feline Urinary Tract Infection Supplement
product_meta.description:
Size:15 MGHomeoPets UTI for Cats works to promote a healthy urinary tract in your cat and to provide relief from any infections.
This product is easily dispensed with a few drops of liquid that can be easily placed in your pet's water or food. In addition to treating the infection itself, this medication also works to relieve these symptoms by supporting kidney function.

HomeoPets UTI for Cats works to ease the burning and facilitate the healing of urinary tract infection. This medication is formulated for cats but can also work to promote urinary tract health in dogs with larger dosages. Homeopets UTI is the perfect addition to your pet's first aid kit, so order it for your pet today!

Key Features:
Promotes healthy urinary tract
Relieves symptoms of UTI and treats the infection
Works for bothc ats and dogs
feature_bullets: HomeoPets UTI for Cats works to promote a healthy urinary tract in your cat and to provide relief from any infections. This product is easily dispensed with a few drops of liquid that can be easily placed in your pet's water or food. In addition to treating the infection itself, this medication also works to relieve these symptoms by supporting kidney function.HomeoPets UTI for Cats works to ease the burning and facilitate the healing of urinary tract infection. This medication is formulated for cats but can also work to promote urinary tract health in dogs with larger dosages. Homeopets UTI is the perfect addition to your pet's first aid kit, so order it for your pet today!Key Features:Promotes healthy urinary tractRelieves symptoms of UTI and treats the infectionWorks for bothc ats and dogs
Easy to administer liquid 450 measured drops per bottle
